fields.name: ActionName
fields.description: Name of action that is recommended by this rule in string.

fields.name: BladeName
fields.description: Deep link to a blade on the portal. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

fields.name: CategoryTags
fields.description: The list of category tags that this recommendation rule belongs to.

fields.name: Channels
fields.description: List of available channels that this rule applies.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Localized detailed description of the rule.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: UI friendly name of the rule.

fields.name: ExtensionName
fields.description: Extension name of the portal if exists. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

fields.name: ForwardLink
fields.description: Forward link to an external document associated with the rule. Applicable to dynamic rule only.

fields.name: IsDynamic
fields.description: True if this is associated with a dynamically added rule

fields.name: Level
fields.description: Level of impact indicating how critical this rule is.

fields.name: Message
fields.description: Localized name of the rule (Good for UI).

fields.name: RecommendationId
fields.description:
Recommendation ID of an associated recommendation object tied to the rule, if exists.
If such an object doesn't exist, it is set to null.
